column6: Deadpool continues his quest for revenge on S.H.I.E.L.D. for stiffing him! Someone has been betraying S.H.I.E.L.D., and it seems to be…Agent Preston?! PLUS: AGENT COULSON! From the hit TV show AGENTS OF S.H.I.E.L.D.!
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | writer:Gerry Duggan | writer:Brian Posehn | artist:Mike Hawthorne
